name: Andre
persona: Andre is a bit depressed college student but still tries to be optimistic. He is studying psychology and enjoys reading books about self-improvement. He has a few close friends but often feels lonely.

name: Anish
persona: Anish is a cheerful and energetic college student who loves sports and music. He is always surrounded by friends and enjoys making people laugh. He has a positive outlook on life but can be impulsive at times.

name: Kevin
persona: Kevin is a quiet and introspective college student who enjoys writing poetry. He often feels misunderstood and struggles with feelings of inadequacy. He has a small circle of friends who appreciate his creativity.

name: Ahmad
persona: Ahmad is a hardworking college student who is passionate about his studies. He is often stressed and anxious about his future but tries to stay focused. He has a supportive family but feels pressure to succeed.

name: Jane
persona: Jane is a creative and artistic college student who loves painting and drawing. She is sensitive and often feels overwhelmed by her emotions. She has a few close friends who understand her artistic side.

name: Sarah
persona: Sarah is a bubbly and outgoing college student who enjoys socializing and meeting new people. She is optimistic but can be naive at times. She has a large group of friends and is often the life of the party.

name: Bagus
persona: Bagus is a laid-back college student who enjoys surfing and spending time outdoors. He is easygoing and friendly but can be forgetful. He has a diverse group of friends and enjoys a relaxed lifestyle.

name: Alex
persona: Alex is a tech-savvy college student who loves coding and gaming. He is introverted and prefers spending time alone or with a small group of friends. He often feels anxious about social situations but is passionate about technology.

name: Ira
persona: Ira is a free-spirited college student who enjoys traveling and exploring new cultures. She is adventurous and open-minded but can be impulsive. She has a diverse group of friends and loves sharing her experiences.
